# Atlas UI

> Beautiful, Open Source, Motion powered components for React, Next.js, and Vanilla JS. Accelerate development, inspire creativity, and bring interfaces to life with seamless animations.

This file provides LLM-friendly entry points to documentation and examples.

## Components

- [Animated Mobile Navbar](https://atlasui.vercel.app/docs/components/animated-mobile-navbar): The Animated Mobile Navbar component.
- [Blend Mouse Trailer](https://atlasui.vercel.app/docs/components/blend-mouse-trailer): The Blend Mouse Trailer component.
- [Blob Mouse Trailer](https://atlasui.vercel.app/docs/components/blob-mouse-trailer): The Blob Mouse Trailer component.
- [Dot And Circle Mouse Trailer](https://atlasui.vercel.app/docs/components/dot-and-circle-mouse-trailer): The Dot And Circle Mouse Trailer component.
- [Hacker Text](https://atlasui.vercel.app/docs/components/hacker-text): The Hacker Text component.
- [Loki Text Effect](https://atlasui.vercel.app/docs/components/loki-text-effect): The Loki Text Effect component.
- [Parallax Sections](https://atlasui.vercel.app/docs/components/parallax-sections): The Parallax Sections component.
- [Project Gallery](https://atlasui.vercel.app/docs/components/project-gallery): The Project Gallery component.
- [Reveal Effect](https://atlasui.vercel.app/docs/components/reveal-effect): The Reveal Effect component.
- [Scroll Based Character Reveal](https://atlasui.vercel.app/docs/components/scroll-based-character-reveal): The Scroll Based Character Reveal component.
- [Scroll Based Text Reveal](https://atlasui.vercel.app/docs/components/scroll-based-text-reveal): The Scroll Based Text Reveal component.
- [Scroll Based Word Reveal](https://atlasui.vercel.app/docs/components/scroll-based-word-reveal): The Scroll Based Word Reveal component.
- [Shiny Button](https://atlasui.vercel.app/docs/components/shiny-button): The Shiny Button component.

## Examples

- [animated-mobile-navbar-demo](https://github.com/SnehdeepDupare/atlas-ui/blob/main/react/examples/animated-mobile-navbar-demo.tsx): Example usage
- [animated-mobile-navbar-side-example](https://github.com/SnehdeepDupare/atlas-ui/blob/main/react/examples/animated-mobile-navbar-side-example.tsx): Example usage
- [project-gallery-demo](https://github.com/SnehdeepDupare/atlas-ui/blob/main/react/examples/project-gallery-demo.tsx): Example usage
- [parallax-sections-demo](https://github.com/SnehdeepDupare/atlas-ui/blob/main/react/examples/parallax-sections-demo.tsx): Example usage
- [shiny-button-demo](https://github.com/SnehdeepDupare/atlas-ui/blob/main/react/examples/shiny-button-demo.tsx): Example usage
- [dot-and-circle-mouse-trailer-demo](https://github.com/SnehdeepDupare/atlas-ui/blob/main/react/examples/dot-and-circle-mouse-trailer-demo.tsx): Example usage
- [blob-mouse-trailer-demo](https://github.com/SnehdeepDupare/atlas-ui/blob/main/react/examples/blob-mouse-trailer-demo.tsx): Example usage
- [blend-mouse-trailer-demo](https://github.com/SnehdeepDupare/atlas-ui/blob/main/react/examples/blend-mouse-trailer-demo.tsx): Example usage
- [hacker-text-demo](https://github.com/SnehdeepDupare/atlas-ui/blob/main/react/examples/hacker-text-demo.tsx): Example usage
- [scroll-based-text-reveal-demo](https://github.com/SnehdeepDupare/atlas-ui/blob/main/react/examples/scroll-based-text-reveal-demo.tsx): Example usage
- [scroll-based-word-reveal-demo](https://github.com/SnehdeepDupare/atlas-ui/blob/main/react/examples/scroll-based-word-reveal-demo.tsx): Example usage
- [scroll-based-character-reveal-demo](https://github.com/SnehdeepDupare/atlas-ui/blob/main/react/examples/scroll-based-character-reveal-demo.tsx): Example usage
- [reveal-effect-demo](https://github.com/SnehdeepDupare/atlas-ui/blob/main/react/examples/reveal-effect-demo.tsx): Example usage
- [reveal-effect-speed-example](https://github.com/SnehdeepDupare/atlas-ui/blob/main/react/examples/reveal-effect-speed-example.tsx): Example usage
- [reveal-effect-delay-example](https://github.com/SnehdeepDupare/atlas-ui/blob/main/react/examples/reveal-effect-delay-example.tsx): Example usage
- [reveal-effect-translate-y-example](https://github.com/SnehdeepDupare/atlas-ui/blob/main/react/examples/reveal-effect-translate-y-example.tsx): Example usage
- [loki-text-effect-demo](https://github.com/SnehdeepDupare/atlas-ui/blob/main/react/examples/loki-text-effect-demo.tsx): Example usage

## Optional

- [Repository](https://github.com/SnehdeepDupare/atlas-ui): Source code and issues
- [Sitemap](https://atlasui.vercel.app/sitemap.xml): Indexable pages
